caption.title: Ordination biplot diagram of Principal Component & Classification Analysis (PCCA) displaying the ordination of treatments [inoculated (+AMF) and non-inoculated samples (âˆ’AMF) at two sampling dates (1:30 d and 2:60 d after inoculation)] in relation to the biomass of microbial groups, PLFA ratios and values of enzymatic activity. Letters above labels indicate significant differences of the corresponding groups' centroids in relation to the first (left) and second (right) ordination axes.
